meanings.definition: In a drunken or intoxicated manner.
meanings.sent1: He stumbled boozily out of the bar.
meanings.sent2: She laughed boozily at the silly joke.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed boozily after knocking over a glass of milk.
meanings.sent4: The car swerved boozily down the winding road.
meanings.sent5: The old man sang boozily at the karaoke night.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive consumption of alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The party had a boozily festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: He woke up with a boozily headache after the wild night.
meanings.sent3: The boozily decorated bar had a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: Her boozily slurred speech gave away her intoxication.
meanings.sent5: The boozily overflowing glass spilled onto the table.
